# Gies College of Business

> Gies College of Business at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign offers undergraduate, graduate, and online degree programs in business. Known for pioneering affordable online MBAs, AI-integrated curriculum, and experiential learning. Part of a top-ranked public research university.

Gies serves 7,000+ students across on-campus and online programs. The college partners with Google on AI tools, integrates generative AI across its curriculum, and operates facilities including the new Wymer Hall with AI-driven course production capabilities. Key differentiators include the iMBA (online MBA on Coursera), Illinois Business Consulting, and the MakerLab.

## Programs

- [Undergraduate Admissions](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/admissions): Admissions info, requirements, and campus visits for prospective undergrads
- [Majors and Minors](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors): Accountancy, Finance, Information Systems, Management, Marketing, Operations Management, Supply Chain Management, Entrepreneurship, Hoeft Technology & Management, Business Minor
- [MBA (iMBA)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/imba): Fully online MBA program offered via Coursera — affordable, flexible, highly ranked
- [MS in Accountancy (MSA/iMSA)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/accountancy): On-campus and online Master of Science in Accountancy
- [MS in Business Analytics (MSBA)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/business-analytics): STEM-designated analytics degree
- [MS in Finance (MSF)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/msf): Master of Science in Finance
- [MS in Management (MSM/iMSM)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/management): On-campus and online management degree
- [MS in Technology Management (MSTM)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/mstm): Technology management master's program
- [Doctoral Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/doctoral): PhD programs in Accountancy, Business Administration, and Finance
- [Online Programs Overview](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/online): iMBA, iMSA, iMSM — fully online graduate degrees
- [Gies Professional Credentials](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/gies-professional-credentials): Stackable credentials, iAcademies, and graduate certificates

## Student Experience

- [Career & Professional Development](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/career-professional-development): Career services, employer connections, Gies Professional Pathway
- [Experiential Learning](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/experiential-learning): Real-world projects with corporate partners
- [Illinois Business Consulting](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/experiential-learning/illinois-business-consulting): Student-run consulting organization serving real clients
- [MakerLab](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/makerlab): Innovation lab for prototyping and hands-on building
- [iVenture Accelerator](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/iventure): Startup accelerator for student entrepreneurs
- [Student Organizations](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/student-organizations): Clubs and professional organizations
- [Academies & Centers](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/academies-centers): Real Estate Finance Academy, Women in Finance Academy, AXIS Risk Management, Golder Academies
- [Gies Global Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/gies-global): Study abroad and international opportunities
- [Undergraduate Outcomes](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/undergraduate-outcomes): Placement rates, salaries, and employer data

## Faculty & Research

- [Faculty Profiles](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/faculty-profiles): Searchable directory of Gies faculty
- [Research at Gies](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/research-at-gies): Overview of research strengths and focus areas
- [Research Centers & Initiatives](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/research/centers-initiatives): Interdisciplinary research centers
- [Academic Departments](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/academic-departments): Accountancy, Business Administration, Finance
- [Faculty & Staff Directory](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/faculty-staff-directory): Full contact directory

## About

- [Gies College of Business](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/): Homepage
- [Artificial Intelligence at Gies](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/about/artificial-intelligence): AI-integrated curriculum, Google Gemini partnership, AI avatars, chatbot initiatives
- [Dean's Office](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/dean): College leadership
- [Gies Facts](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/our-story/gies-facts): Rankings, enrollment, and key statistics
- [Our Facilities](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/our-story/facilities): Campus buildings including Wymer Hall
- [Access and Community](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/our-story/access-and-community): Diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives
- [Contact Us](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/contact-us): General contact information

## Corporate & Alumni

- [Corporate Partners](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/corporate): Partnership opportunities — invest, recruit, develop workforce, solve challenges
- [Alumni](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/alumni): Alumni network and engagement
- [Give to Gies](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/support-gies/giving): Donation and philanthropy information
- [Office of Advancement](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/advancement): Development and fundraising

## News & Events

- [Gies News](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/news): Latest articles and announcements
- [Events Calendar](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/events): Upcoming events, lectures, and workshops

## Optional

- [Scholarships & Tuition](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/scholarships): Financial aid information for undergrads
- [Honors Program](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/honors): Honors track for high-achieving students
- [Talk to an Advisor](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/talk-to-an-advisor): Schedule a conversation with graduate admissions
- [Academic Advising](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/academic-advising): Advising resources for current students
